item.description:
The July meeting was great. Covered a lot of ground on new products and techniques out there to help with recovery. Next meeting in August is for open discussion. Please e-mail me with any types of speakers you would like to see in the coming months.

Betsy
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the one with the briefcase and all the papers in front of me.
item.why: You'll love it because everyone here, while in pain and suffering, is dedicated to getting well and are proactive in that endeavor.
item.name: The Reading Fibromyalgia August Meetup
